title: District Profile: Florida's 26th Congressional District
teaser: Incumbent Democrat Joe Garcia is facing Republican candidate Carlos Curbelo.
contentencoded:
In this week’s District Profile, we turn to Florida’s 26th Congressional district, where incumbent Democrat Joe Garcia is fighting to keep his job against opponent Carlos Curbelo, a businessman and Miami-Dade school board member.

John O’Connor, a reporter for WLRN, a member of the Here & Now Contributors Network tells Jeremy Hobson about the race.

  • See more District Profiles in our series

Guest

  • John O’Connor, reporter for WLRN. He tweets @johnroconnor.
